resources.title: Thinking Elixir 124 — Caching Things Anywhere with Nebulex
resources.description: Conversation with Nebulex’s author on decorator-style caching, adapters, and use cases.

resources.title: EMx 235 — Caching Complexity: The Evolution of Nebulex
resources.description: Elixir Mix episode exploring algorithms, eviction policies, and Nebulex’s architecture.

resources.description: AppSignal guide introducing Nebulex and showing local cache set-up and usage.
